products.title: Security Personnel
products.body: We can supply Nepalese or local armed/unamrmed guards anywhere in Malaysia. Our guards are hand-picked, professionally trained and KDN vetted.

products.title: Event Security
products.body: Our security personnel are trained by professionals with effective crowd control strategies to guarantee the risk to staff, equipment and VIP guests are minimised.

products.title: Bodyguards & Escorts
products.body: We can provide professional, trained personal or point to point escort protection details.
